decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (2013-0038-001; 2013-0038-003; 2013-0038-004; 2013-0038-050; 2013-0038-051. Received 12/10/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The opening hours of the premises shall be as follows: Monday to Thursday: 11:00 am to 23:30 pm and Friday to Sunday: 11 am to midnight.
Condition : 5 - The premises shall not be used for the sale of hot food for consumption off of the premises.

Condition : 6 - There shall be no outdoor seating area provided on the pavement outside the unit on High Street associated with the on-going use of the unit as an Ice Cream Parlour and/or Restaurant, unless a subsequent application is made to and approved by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 7 - The ventilation flue hereby permitted shall not operate later than 23:00 from Monday to Thursday and no later than midnight on any other day shall not recommence operation before the premises re-open on the following day.

Condition : 8 - The ventilation flue hereby permitted shall be subject to regular servicing and maintenance as well as best practice shall be implemented by the proprietors. Records of such works shall be documented.
description: Variation of conditions 2 (approved plans) and 5 to allow for provision of additional kitchen space for food preparation and cooking and installation of a ventillation flue, following planning permission 00610/33/P5 dated 28/11/2016 for Retrospective application for the change of use from A1 (Ice Cream Parlour) to A3 (Restaurant).
